name: Drag For Life
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare - 50.  In 48 Hours

Aliens are going to invade earth. its inevitable. You are liam who wants to live for many years.  can liam escape his inevitable death? play and find out

Controls:

WASD - to move,   go near a object and left click to attach with rope and then move.

please feel free to report bugs!

Thanks for Playing.
